resources.string: One category was not moved, because the same label already exists at the target.

You need to enable this widget in the app settings.

Setting a security question allows you to unlock the app, in case you forget your password.

Please set a number between %1$d and %2$d
Amounts in the database need to be updated in order to match the new number of fraction digits.
If amounts are not updated, they will be displayed as multiplied by %d after the change.
If amounts are not updated, they will be displayed as divided by %d after the change.
If amounts are updated, you will lose the information about their fractional part.

Backup database daily at the specified time (only if data has changed).

Your transaction has been completed, and a receipt for your purchase has been emailed to you. You may log into your account at www.paypal.com to view details of this transaction.
An unexpected error occurred forcing the application to stop. Please help us fix this by sending us error data, all you have to do is click OK.
You might add your comments about the problem below:
Please enter the URL to a special folder on your WebDAV server. {app_name} will store its data inside this folder, it won\'t touch anything outside of it.
The website uses a certificate, which is not trusted by Android.
The certificate could not be trusted. It seems invalid.
The URL does not point to a WebDAV resource.
The URL does not exist on the server.
How often should data be synchronized (in hours).
Set to 0 in order to deactivate automatic sync.
If you unlink this account from %s, the synchronization status gets lost. Linking them again later, requires a full synchronization to be executed again.

An account with uuid %s exists both in the local database and on the remote backend. When you link both, you need to decide, if, initially, you want to upload local data to the remote backend or download remote data to the local database.
An account with uuid %s already exists in the local database and is linked to a different remote backend.
Remote backend %s will be removed. This will not affect data stored locally or remotely, but synchronization status gets lost.
Remote data for this account will be deleted. Make sure no other devices are linked to it.
Local data for this account will be deleted.
The trial period for testing feature %s has ended.
This folder is used for synchronizing data between installations of {app_name} on different devices. Please do not modify any of its contents manually.
The folder you have selected corresponds to one account of an existing backend. You need to select its parent folder in order to reuse this backend.
An account with the same uuid already exists on the remote backend.
The conflict can be resolved manually from the entry\'s context menu.
In addition to local storage on the device, the backup file can be copied to a remote backend.
Backup file %1$s has been successfully stored on backend %2$s.
Auto-backup has been deactivated. You can turn it on again from the settings after solving the problem (e.g. selecting a different folder for backups).
Allow us to collect anonymous data about usage patterns that helps us plan improvements.
